summary: The blacksmith of a small western town finds himself an outcast. He had led the townspeople west in hopes of starting a new life, only to find the town that they founded is to be bypassed by the railroad.
cast: Dan Blocker|Susan Clark|John Dehner|Warren Oates|Paul Petersen|Don Stroud|Henry Jones|Sandy Kenyon|Edgar Buchanan|Tom Nolan|Conlan Carter|Iron Eyes Cody|Ralph Neff|Joan Shawlee|Grady Sutton|Dub Taylor|Gail Bonney|John Breen|Noble 'Kid' Chissell|Troy Melton|Mabel Smaney|George Tracy|Red West
title: Algo para un hombre solitario
